elements.content: A pair of 3D enantiotopic zinc(II) complexes based on two asymmetric achiral ligands†II Ming-Dao Zhang Yan-Le Li Zhen-Zhen Shi He-Gen Zheng and Jing Ma 1,23,45,678,910,1112,13141516–18519,2055,21–2324,25Mirror symmetric coordination environments in 1L (left) and 1R (right). Most hydrogen atoms and solvent molecules are omitted for clarity (30% ellipsoid probability).1D helices formed from 1,2,4-btc3− anions coordinating to metal atoms in 1R (a) and 1L (b), and model diagrams of these helices in 1R (c) and 1L (d) (the pitch of the helices is 9.57 Å).Enantiomeric packing drawings of the 3D structures of complexes 1L (a) and 1R (b).26Schematic representations of new enantiomeric {6·8·10}{6·83·102}{82·10}{85·10} topologies in compounds 1L (a) and 1R (b).27Solid-state circular dichroism (CD) spectrum (dotted) and UV-vis absorption spectrum (solid) of complex 1.Partial enlarged view of the nearby coordinated water molecules and nitrite anions in 1L (a) with hydrogen bonds and 1R (b) without hydrogen bonds.28–323334–36Calculated HOMO, HOMO−1, LUMO and LUMO+1 levels for 1L.Calculated HOMO, HOMO−1, LUMO and LUMO+1 levels for 1R.Phase-matching curves (i.e. particle size vs. SHG intensity) for complex 1 and KDP. Mirror symmetric coordination environments in 1L (left) and 1R (right). Most hydrogen atoms and solvent molecules are omitted for clarity (30% ellipsoid probability).

1D helices formed from 1,2,4-btc3- anions coordinating to metal atoms in 1R (a) and 1L (b), and model diagrams of these helices in 1R (c) and 1L (d) (the pitch of the helices is 9.57 Å).

Enantiomeric packing drawings of the 3D structures of complexes 1L (a) and 1R (b).

Phase-matching curves (i.e. particle size vs. SHG intensity) for complex 1 and KDP. The curve is to guide the eye and is not a fit to the data. (The picture inset shows the process of second-order NLO effects.)

[^a]: The luminescence decay curves were fitted with a double-exponential decay function: Fit = A + B<sub>1</sub> × exp(−t/τ<sub>1</sub>) + B<sub>2</sub> × exp(−t/τ<sub>2</sub>).

metadata.title: A pair of 3D enantiotopic zinc( ii ) complexes based on two asymmetric achiral ligands
